Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 111st overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1969...
Injured on 4/26/1974 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/15/1975, off Antonio Bravo (PG)...
